abstract: Brocade Communications Systems has held discussions with private equity firms over a potential sale of the networking hardware company, pushing its shares higher on Monday.
snippet: Brocade Communications Systems has held discussions with private equity firms over a potential sale of the networking hardware company, pushing its shares higher on Monday.

headline.main: Brocade Shares Jump Amid Progress on Potential Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
